name: The Field of Sentiments
description:
The Field of Sentiments is a game we developed for Global Game Jam 18 during 48 hours. It is about a future world where emotions are illegal. Players play as a scientist/biotechnologist who farms emotions and sells them at a black market. Players will encounter different customers and get involved in their story. This game combines regular farming elements and narrative aspects where players have to make difficult decisions like in Papers, Please.

Game Design & Programming - Kelly Chang website twitter
Game Design & Writing - Pratik Jain
Art - Yu-Hsuan Lin 
Writing - Bryce Summers
